text: Kledis Hereki (born 27 September 1995) is an Albanian footballer who plays for Mandraikos as a left back. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Albanian footballers Category:AEK Athens F.C. players Category:A.O. title: Kledis Hereki
